channel.title: Application Porting on Blade Su The Coder
channel.description: Recent content in Application Porting on Blade Su The Coder

item.title: An cross-compiling exercise: porting Qt Application to ARM-base environment with docker environment.
item.description: Recently I finish a exercise that porting Qt-based application from my development environment (Mac OS 10.13.6) to an ARM-based environment(Orange Pi with sunxi H6 SoC). Moreover, I create a docker container as cross-compiling environment with assigned toolchain for ARM. If we want to run a Qt application on a machine with ARM CPU, we need to prepare built the libraries for Qt runtime. Not only the libraries but the application should be built with the ARM toolchain.
